steps.title: Pair navy sneakers with shorts and a long-sleeved tee for a cool look.
steps.content: Pair navy sneakers with shorts and a long-sleeved tee for a cool look. Slip on a pair of neutral-toned shorts, as well as a brightly colored or patterned long-sleeve tee. [1] X Expert Source Neepa Sikdar Personal Stylist Expert Interview. 11 February 2022. Finish the look with dark, ankle-high socks that allow you to show off your sneakers. [2] X Research source For instance, you can wear a long-sleeved, red and white striped tee with a pair of white shorts. As an extra accent to your outfit, consider slipping on a neutral-toned belt. If you’re preparing for colder weather, switch out your shorts for a comfortable set of pants or chinos.

steps.title: Slip on a bomber jacket and blue jeans for a casual vibe.
steps.content: Slip on a bomber jacket and blue jeans for a casual vibe. Choose a comfortable, neutral-toned shirt that won’t clash with your sneakers. Create a subtle outfit with blue jeans, then top off your ensemble with a dark bomber jacket. [3] X Research source For example, try pairing a white polo shirt with a pair of light blue jeans. Then, you can finish off the outfit with a navy blue or black bomber jacket. Retro-style trainers and high-tops look great in casual outfits. [4] X Research source You can wear a T-shirt, joggers, and a bomber jacket. [5] X Expert Source Neepa Sikdar Personal Stylist Expert Interview. 11 February 2022.

steps.title: Relax with dark sweatpants, a hoodie, and navy sneakers.
steps.content: Relax with dark sweatpants, a hoodie, and navy sneakers. Slip into a comfortable pair of dark sweatpants or trousers that have a flexible waistband. To add onto the comfort, wear a black hoodie overtop. [6] X Research source This is a great, lazy outfit for the weekend. Try experimenting by pairing different shades of navy and black! You can go all navy from head to toe and do work pants that are navy blue with a thin merino wool sweater and navy sneakers. [7] X Expert Source Neepa Sikdar Personal Stylist Expert Interview. 11 February 2022.

steps.title: Get ready for a day out in a polo shirt and casual shorts.
steps.content: Get ready for a day out in a polo shirt and casual shorts. Choose a brightly-colored polo shirt to serve as the main accent of your ensemble. To supplement your outfit, slip on a pair of comfortable, thigh- or knee-length shorts. As a final touch, don a pair of ankle-high, white socks to contrast with your navy sneakers. [8] X Research source For instance, you can create a cohesive outfit by wearing navy shorts to match your sneakers. To keep with the blue theme, pick out a turquoise or light blue polo shirt to match your sneakers and shorts. Try accessorizing this outfit with a navy backpack. You can also pair a regular white tee with a pair of denim shorts for a more relaxed vibe. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Pair a sweater and shorts to give off an easygoing vibe.
steps.content: Pair a sweater and shorts to give off an easygoing vibe. Slip on a loose, comfortable sweater in the bright color of your choice. To offset the color tones of your top, select a pair of black shorts to complete the outfit. [10] X Research source For example, you can pair a pink crew-neck sweater with black shorts and navy sneakers. As a stylish touch, slip on a pair of sunglasses, too!

steps.title: Create a sleek look with dark jeans and a neutral-toned overcoat.
steps.content: Create a sleek look with dark jeans and a neutral-toned overcoat. Slip on a pair of dark, boot-cut or tapered jeans that fit snugly around your ankles. Wear a neutral-toned top as the base of your outfit, then layer a dark, long-sleeved tee overtop. [11] X Expert Source Michelle T. Sterling Personal Style and Color Analysis Expert Expert Interview. 27 February 2025. To finish off your ensemble, pick out a dark overcoat that matches the other elements of your outfit. [12] X Research source For instance, you can pair a black, long-sleeved tee with a pair of black, tapered jeans. To complete the outfit, slip on a long, gray overcoat. This would be a great outfit to wear during an outing or shopping trip. Slip-on navy sneakers are a great option for upscale, professional outfits. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Assemble an office-ready look with a button-down and slacks.
steps.content: Assemble an office-ready look with a button-down and slacks. Choose a blue or neutral-toned shirt to serve as the base of your outfit. [14] X Expert Source Michelle T. Sterling Personal Style and Color Analysis Expert Expert Interview. 27 February 2025. Make your ensemble look more formal by slipping on a dark or neutral-toned button-down shirt overtop. To make the outfit more cohesive, pick out a pair of slacks. [15] X Research source For example, pair a blue, button-down shirt with a pair of navy slacks, then finish off the outfit with a tan jacket. If you don’t have a button-down, you could pair a white blouse with black slacks. [16] X Research source

steps.title: Get ready for a night out with dark jeans and a nice jacket.
steps.content: Get ready for a night out with dark jeans and a nice jacket. Choose a neutral-toned tee or button-down to create a base for your outfit. Pick out a pair of dark slacks or chinos to match with your shirt nicely, then slip on a blazer overtop. [17] X Research source For instance, slip on a light blue, teal or gray dress shirt, then pair it with a pair of black chinos or slacks. To add extra flair to your outfit, pick out a dark, navy or black blazer to wear on top. Minimalist sneakers and lifestyle runners can look great when used in a sleek, professional outfit. [18] X Research source

steps.title: Create a bold look with a neutral-toned sweater and bright pants.
steps.content: Create a bold look with a neutral-toned sweater and bright pants. Put on a light-colored dress shirt and bright pair of skinny jeans or slacks. To make a more dramatic contrast, slip on a neutral-toned sweater overtop the dress shirt. [19] X Research source For example, pair a light blue dress shirt with a pair of orange slacks or chinos and a cream-colored sweater. When wearing a dress shirt with a sweater, make sure that the collar is visible on top. This type of outfit may work well in an academic setting. To create a more feminine look, consider pairing a brightly-colored dress with your navy sneakers instead. [20] X Research source
